verses.text: Ha eb' quelemtac te tzak'anto t'ayin, tzin stzetzej eb' ticnaic, ocxo t'a yalanhtaxo, a eb' smam eb' manh smojoc yek' eb' yet' nok' in tz'i' stanhvan nok' in calnel.
Toxonton malaj yip eb', malaj tz'och eb' vuuj.
Yuj vejel yet' meb'ail, tzek' eb' t'a taquinh lu'um t'ak'walil sch'ocoj, haxo sch'anhal yib'tac te te' sjoyq'ueta eb' sk'uxu'.
Slaj stok'q'ueta anh comon ank'ultak eb' t'a caltac te' schi'a, schi'an pax sch'anhal yib' te' meslab' eb'.
Aton juntzanh anima chi' pechb'ilel yuj eb' yetanimail. Ayic spechjib'at eb' chi', tz'el yav eb' spechanb'at eb' chi', icha tz'aj spechji eb' elk'um.
Ha t'a yoltac q'uen nhaq'ueen, t'a sattac k'acap yet' t'a sattac q'uen tenam, ata' ix laj aj eb'.
Slaj avaj eb' t'a caltac vayumtac icha yel yav nok' nok', haxo t'a yichtac yoc te' q'uiix slaj smolb'ej sb'a eb'.
Malaj jab'oc tas syal yuj eb', malaj yelk'och eb', pechb'ilel eb' t'a skal eb' anima.
Axo ticnaic tzin sb'uch eb' yuninal eb', syik'anel in q'uixvelal eb'.
Tzin syajan eb', tz'el eb' t'a in tz'ey, stzub'anoch eb' t'a in sat.
Palta a ticnaic, ha Dios ix ik'anel vip, maxtzac yal in colan in b'a, yuj chi' syak' val sgana eb' in yixtani.
Ha eb' anima schichon sk'ol t'ayin, toxonhej sja nhilan eb' yic tzin spechanel eb' snaani, snib'ej eb' tzin sateli.
Smacan yol in b'e eb' yic tzin satanel eb' snaani, manhxa mach scachan eb'.
Sjavi nhilnaj eb' t'ayin, ichato ay junok olan b'aj tz'ochta nhilnaj eb', ma icha co yamchaj yuj junok ik' nhab'.
Icha val chi' tz'aj sjavi xivk'olal t'ayin. Ha in b'inajnaquil ix sateli, ichato ix ik'jib'at yuj ik'. Masanil tas ay t'ayin ix satcanel icha asun.
Ha ticnaic van in chami, maxtzac och vaan in yaelal tik.
Ha in yaelal tik sk'och val t'a yoltac in b'aquil. Max och vaan vab'an syail tzek' ak'val.
Yed' val yip Dios ichato ix sch'umoch sut'an in pichul t'a in jaj, ix och b'iran t'a in nivanil.
Ix in sjulem t'a cal sok'om. Icha lum pococ, ma q'uen tik'aq'uil taanh in ajkan t'a yol sat.
Ach in Diosal, tzin k'an a colval, palta max ach tak'vi t'ayin. Tzin tevi t'ayach palta maxtzac a cha ab'i.
Chuc tzutej a b'a t'ayin, tzin a pechan yet' yoval a k'ool.
Ichato tzin ik'jiq'ue vaan yuj ik', haxo ik' nhab' tzin tzicub'tanhani.
Vojtacxo to vanxo in ik'anb'at t'a chamel, aton b'aj ol k'ochnhej masanil anima.
Palta ¿tocval max q'ue ch'ican sk'ab' junok mach ayek' t'a skal syaelal yic sk'anan colval?
In ok' yuj eb' ayoch t'a syaelal, in cus yuj eb' malaj tas ay t'ay.
Palta haxo ticnaic ayic tzin tanhvan tzalajk'olal, haxo cusk'olal sjavi t'ayin. Tzin tanhvej sakil k'inal, haxo k’ik’ k’inal sjavi.
Toxonhej stinhtinhan in pixan yuj xivelal, maxtzac yal vik'an jab'oc vip, axonhej yaelal ste ja t'a vib'anh.
Ix ja val cusk'olal t'ayin, maxtzac vil-laj sakil k'inal. Val t'a yichanh anima tzin q'ue vaan in k'anan colval.
Cuseltacxonhej yel vav icha nok' oques, ma icha nok' cujub'.
Ha in tz'umal ix te k'ik'b'ieli, schivajpax in nivanil yuj k'ak'.
Ha t'a yalanhtaxo, tzin b'itan val yet' yamk'ab' yic b'it t'a tzalajk'olal, haxo ticnaic, anhej oq'uel svak'a'.
